briefTitle: The Paediatric EVICEL® Soft Tissue and Parenchymal Organ Bleeding Study

outcomeMeasures.title: Absolute Time to Haemostasis
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute time to haemostasis, defined as absolute time when there was no detectable bleeding at the Target Bleeding Site (TBS).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Achieving Haemostasis at 4 Minutes
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants achieving haemostasis at target bleeding site at 4 minutes. This endpoint is assessing haemostasis at 4 minutes only and not maintenance of haemostasis following this timepoint. As rebleeding may occur between timepoints, subsequent rebleeding (if any) is detailed in treatment failure analysis.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Achieving Haemostasis at 7 Minutes
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants Achieving Haemostasis at Target Bleeding Site at 7 Minutes. This endpoint is assessing haemostasis at 7 minutes only and is not affected by haemostasis assessment prior to 7 minutes or maintenance of haemostasis following this 7 minute assessment. As rebleeding may occur between timepoints, subsequent rebleeding (if any) is detailed in treatment failure analysis.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Achieving Haemostasis at 10 Minutes
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants Achieving Haemostasis at Target Bleeding Site at 10 Minutes. This endpoint is assessing haemostasis at 10 minutes only and is not affected by haemostasis assessments prior to 10 minutes or maintenance of haemostasis following this 10 minute assessment. As rebleeding may occur between timepoints, subsequent rebleeding (if any) is detailed in treatment failure analysis).

outcomeMeasures.title: Incidence of Treatment Failures (Number of Participants)
outcomeMeasures.description: Defined as haemostasis not achieved within 10 minutes or bleeding requiring treatment other than re-application of the assigned haemostatic adjunct within 10 minutes.

outcomeMeasures.title: Estimated Blood Loss
outcomeMeasures.description: Blood loss during surgical procedure (includes but not limited to the target bleeding site)

outcomeMeasures.title: Participants Receiving a Blood Transfusion
outcomeMeasures.description: Details of blood products received (if any)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Haemoglobin and Mean Corpuscular Haemoglobin Concentration
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge (Haemoglobin and Mean Corpuscular Haemoglobin Concentration)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Haematocrit
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in red blood cell proportion in volume in the blood from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Platelet Count and White Cell Count
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Red Blood Cell Count
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Mean Corpuscular Haemoglobin
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Mean Corpuscular Volume
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Neutrophils, Lymphocytes, Monocytes, Eosinophils and Basophils
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes in volume from baseline to post operative hospital discharge (Neutrophils, Lymphocytes, Monocytes, Eosinophils and Basophils)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time and Prothrombin Time
outcomeMeasures.description: Laboratory parameter changes from baseline to post operative hospital discharge (Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time and Prothrombin Time)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Laboratory Parameters International Normalised Ratio
outcomeMeasures.description: Standardized measurement of the change in blood clotting time from baseline to post operative hospital discharge

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a Thrombotic Event
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants with a Thrombotic Event.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With an Adverse Event Related to Re-bleeding at Target Bleeding Site
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants with an Adverse Event Related to Re-bleeding at Target Bleeding Site.
